description: Goats cheese and fennel are the perfect match for lentils in this warm salad that takes mere minutes to make.
name: Goats Cheese, Fennel & Lentil Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red onions, peeled and finely sliced
1 tsp Dijon mustard, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the lentils according to pack instructions. Shave the fennel into thin slices using a mandolin and add to a large bowl with the red onions, grapes and warm lentils.
Whisk the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey and mustard together to make a dressing. Pour into the salad bowl and toss to coat.
Crumble over the goats cheese and chopped almonds and serve.
